data.title: Port Conway (King George County, VA)
data.meta_description: Summarized details about Port Conway (King George County, State of Virginia).  Contains: area code, GPS coordinates (latitude/longitude) and much more.
data.text:
About Port Conway (Click for our profile page)

Located in: King George County (see below)

Typical Abbreviation: Prt. Conway

Time Zone: Port Conway lies in the Eastern Time Zone (EST/EDT)

Telephone Area Code: (540)

Elevation: Near sea level<1>

GPS Coordinates (Latitude/Longitude)<2>

For the purpose of mapping and calculating distances, we have chosen the following reference point for Port Conway:

Lat: 38.179100° (or 38°10'44" N)

Lon: -77.185300° (or -77°11'7" W)

USGS Topo Map: Port Royal<3>

Federal GNIS/FIPS Codes for Port Conway

GNIS ID: 1499897

FIPS State / Place Code: 51 / 63795

(For more about Federal Codes, see our Misc Page for Port Conway)

About King George County

The community of King George is the County Seat for King George County.

From the 2010 US Census (For more detail, see our Census Page for King George)

Population

YearPopulation2019 Est:<4> 26,981 (14.4% increase since 2010) 2010 23,584 (40.36% increase since 2000)2000: 16,803

Total Area:<5> 187.8 sq. miles [486.3 km²] - of which 4.33% is water (8.12 sq. miles [21 km²])

Housing Units: <6> 9,477

Official Website: www.king-george.va.us/
